<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Run Full Pipeline"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/style-transfer/full-pipeline"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Run complete style transfer pipeline.

**Flow A (URL mode):** Provide `product_url` for automatic extraction.
**Flow B (Manual mode):** Provide `title` + `description` + optional `image_urls`.

The pipeline runs asynchronously:
1. Extract product data (or use manual input)
2. Run 100-agent style analysis
3. Generate styled images with FLUX.2 Max

Poll GET /status/\{thread_id\} for progress and results.

Args:
    body: Pipeline request with either product_url (Flow A) or title (Flow B)

Returns:
    FullPipelineResponse with thread_id for polling
